name: Street Racer (1977)
summary:
Street Racer was one of the two launch titles programmed by Kaplan; Air-Sea Battle was the other. Street Racer offered 27 game variations, grouped into the following sub-games:
1–6: Street racer
7–12: Slalom
13–16: Dodgem
17–20: Jet shooter
21–24: Number cruncher
25–27: Scoop ball
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 别名: Speedway II
  • 平台: Atari 2600
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 1~4人
  • 发行日期: 1977年9月11日
  • 游戏设计师: Larry Kaplan
